description:
Erza`s secret past... In return for battling for her freedom from forced labor, she "loses" Jellal! Possessed by the black wizard Zeref, Jellal turns into evil itself... What is the sad truth that lays between him and Erza? Meanwhile, the Council continues their deliberations as to whether to use their ultimate weapon of destruction, Etherion! Everyone is headed to an uncertain fate!
Source: crunchyroll
